combat[source]

combat(player, boss)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
wizard = init_player()
boss = Demon("Henry", BOSS_BASE_HEALTH, BOSS_BASE_DAMAGE)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
combat(wizard, boss)
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
